summary: Corrects the leveled list for the Amulet of Articulation to feature proper scaling, and edits the descriptions of the different versions to show the actual enchantment magnitude.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7823]Also available on Steam Workshop[/url]

Those of you who have completed the Thieves Guild quest line may have noticed something rather odd about the Amulet of Articulation. For some reason, the leveled item list that decides which version you get awarded picks randomly from seven different possible variations in strength. In addition, the description on the amulet itself does not always match up correctly with the underlying enchantment.

This mod fixes both problems.

The various versions of the Amulet have been sorted onto a proper leveled list, and the description has been edited to accurately reflect the level of the enchantment. The scaling works as follows:

1-4: 10%
5-9: 12%
10-14: 15%
15-19: 17%
20-24: 20%
25-27: 22%
28+: 25%

This mod does not replace underleveled versions of the Amulet as your character increases in level, although that functionality can be obtained from this mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7590]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7590[/url]
author: LLJKTechnogeek
